details.name: Dhekorgorah Road
details.remarks:
1.Due to the rising water level of Bhodgoi river the embankment near Solmora subsided along the road on the country side for a length of approx. 100m.
To address the issue earth filling was done along with bamboo palasiding.
2 .Due to increase in water level of Bhogdoi River. flood boiling occure at 5 (Five) nos, location along the embankment at 10th KM of Dhekorgorah Road.
Remedial measures
A. Protection of embankment is done with earth filled cement bags

details.name: Dhekorgorah Road
details.remarks:
The subsidence that occured on 06/07/2025 was
repaired and repair works were completed on 07/07/2025. But today again the crack developed in the same area and subsidence occurred. Repair works were done today by earth filling and bamboo
palasiding and stacking of earth-filled cement bags.

remarks.remarks: (Halem - 1700 water pouches also distributed by PHED, Gohpur)
(Sissiborgaon - Assessment is ongoing for animals washed away. The exact number of animals affected has not been reported yet.)
(Haflong -  Due to incessant rainfall, a flash flood occurred last night (29-07-2025), which affected the crop area, as reported by the District Agriculture Officer.)

(Golaghat - Hot cooked meal was served for relief camp inmates, Cook food have been provided to the camp inmates, cooked food are provided to the camp inmates of newly opend relief camps.), (Bokakhat - 3 new villages have been added because of agriculture damages. As such no.of affected people has increased although Dhansiri  flood water is receding. , two more villages have been added because of agriculture damages.)

(Doboka - Crop submergence report submitted by ADO Rengbeng dated 06.07.2025- 65ha  (Sali seedling 24 ha, Bao Paddy 41 ha)
Due to incessant rainfall and release of water from irrigation sluice gates of Bokolia, water level of Jamuna river is increasing., Crop submergence report submitted by ADO Rengbeng dated 07.07.2025- 102ha  (Sali seedling 40 ha, Bao Paddy 62 ha)
Crop submergence report submitted by ADO Nilbagan dated 07.07.2025- 17ha 
Country Boats used on dated 07.07.2025- 2 nos

(Titabor - Crop area affected due to siltation.), (Teok - Due to high water level of river Jhanji and rising trend of river Brahmaputra, water enters through damaged left ring bundh of river Jhanji at Ouguri Nepali Gaon Sounth Part (under Bonai and Gelekoni Rev Village) and inundated the area. Moreover, low lying areas under Boria, 2 No Kawoimari and 1 No Kawoimari (namely Ajarguri North Part, Sonariati A, B and Boralimora) inundated by river Jhanji on right side between river and the Jhanji Right Embankment due to absence of ring bundh at those areas starting from Ajarguri onwards to Jhanji outfall., Grazing fields at 2 No Kawoimari have been submerged due to recent high rise in water level of the Jhanji River. As a result, the livestock in the area are in urgent need of feed.)

(Silonijan - Total around 1 hac area of Tea Garden was partially submerged due to water logging ,Village- Purana Silonijan Shilkhuti Road, Dihingia Rev.village under Silonijan Revenue Circle. Lat.- 26.34549061, Long.- 93.87791473)

(Kampur - Due to rising water level of River Jamuna at Doboka , which connects to River Nishari under Kampur Revenue Circle from Sarupathar Swahidpur, a total of 19 villages crop areas and roads inundated till today on dated 09.07.2025.)
